content.question:
A manufacturer of a certain item knows that <math alttext="1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> percent of the items produced on a certain assembly line are defective. Suppose that <math alttext="100" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>100</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> items produced on that assembly line will be selected at random.
Which of the following expressions represents the probability that <math alttext="3" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> of the <math alttext="100" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>100</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> items selected will be defective?

choices.label: <math alttext="open parenthesis, 100 choose 3, close parenthesis, times 0.01 cubed, times 0.99 to the 97 power" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mtable><mtr><mtd><mn>100</mn></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mn>3</mn></mtd></mtr></mtable><mo>)</mo></mrow><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>0.01</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>0.99</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>97</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="open parenthesis, 100 choose 97, close parenthesis, times 0.01 to the 97 power, times 0.99 cubed" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mtable><mtr><mtd><mn>100</mn></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mn>97</mn></mtd></mtr></mtable><mo>)</mo></mrow><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>0.01</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>97</mn></mrow></msup><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>0.99</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="open parenthesis, 97 choose 3, close parenthesis, times 0.01 cubed, times 0.99 to the 97 power" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mtable><mtr><mtd><mn>97</mn></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mn>3</mn></mtd></mtr></mtable><mo>)</mo></mrow><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>0.01</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>0.99</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>97</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="open parenthesis, 97 choose 3, close parenthesis, times 0.01 to the 97 power, times 0.99 cubed" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mtable><mtr><mtd><mn>97</mn></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mn>3</mn></mtd></mtr></mtable><mo>)</mo></mrow><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>0.01</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>97</mn></mrow></msup><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>0.99</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="open parenthesis, 100 choose 3, close parenthesis, times 0.01 cubed, times 0.99 cubed" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mtable><mtr><mtd><mn>100</mn></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mn>3</mn></mtd></mtr></mtable><mo>)</mo></mrow><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>0.01</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>0.99</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="open parenthesis, 100 choose 3, close parenthesis, times 0.01 cubed, times 0.99 to the 97 power" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mtable><mtr><mtd><mn>100</mn></mtd></mtr><mtr><mtd><mn>3</mn></mtd></mtr></mtable><mo>)</mo></mrow><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>0.01</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>0.99</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>97</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mstyle></math>

unit.text: 4: Probability, Random Variables, and Probability Distributions

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine relative frequencies, proportions, or probabilities using simulation or calculations.
